name: DEFRAG (itch) (jim hollenbach)
description:
DEFRAG

move the blocks to fill the lower part of the grid.

controls: up/left/down/right or w/a/s/d.  space bar to pick up and drop pieces.

snowflakes: freeze drops for 5s, bombs: blow up 5 pieces, arrows: squish top 6 pieces.

red pieces are on the verge of being deleted.

made in 48 hours for ludum dare 42.

source is available on github: https://github.com/jdhollen/defrag-ld42

fonts used: m3x6 by daniel linssen
